Posts.Content: hi thankyou it is hard not to worry and i think the not knowing is the hardest part ! because you think alsorts i would like to say it has helped me so much reading some of the posts on this site thanks again
Posts.Title: awaiting mammogram

Posts.Content: hi yes i actually had a ultra sound i was told that they was nt sure what it was they said it could be a cyst,fibroids, or a prominent gland and as it was a spot check appointment i had to go back to my doctors and if he was concerned then he would refer me back so although i came out with my mind at rest alittle i still didnt really get any answers im now waiting to get back in to see my gp and take it from there more waiting thankyou
Posts.Title: awaiting mammogram

Posts.Content: hi im new to the forum thing bu tive been going out of my mind with worry im 31 years of age and have 4 children i went to the doctors last week for a follow up as 18 months ago i had a hysterectomy and im still not right so while i was there i asked the doctor to check my left breast as i thought i had found a lump but i was convinced to my horror he said i had a lump the size of a one pence piece and possibly another i got my appointment through only a couple of days after as to which i go to next tuesday so of course now i am imagining allsorts i have noticed im leaking a little discharge occasionally but im not sure if thats any thing to worry about and my left breast does seem a little bigger than normal please can anyone give me any advice thanks for reading this tereza
Posts.Title: awaiting mammogram

Posts.Content: hi you guys sorry to bother you again up untill yesterday i was fairly optimistic about my lumps and going for a mammogram but yesterday i got a really dull pain in my neck and shoulder on the same side as the breast with the lumps i thought i may have pulled it as im fairly active but i cant recall when this morning the pain has got worse and its really worrying as im not sure whether its connected please can anyone help or put my mind at rest thankyou
